text: Anteros Coachworks is a American car brand headquartered in San Jose, California it makes Sports cars it was founded in 2005 by Roger Hector. which is the current owner of the company the company's cars are hand bullit and is known for making the Anteros sports car. == The Anteros sports car == The Anteros sports car was made from 2006 to 2009 it was based on the Chevrolet Corvette C6 and had a 6.0 LS2 V8 engine with 500 hp.Automotive Art & Design with a 6-speed manual transmission the car was made at Anteros Coachworks's facility in California and costs 149,500 dollars per unit. == References == Category:Automobile companies Category:sports cars
title: Anteros Coachworks
